column4: my mac can see my Edgy box but can't connect to it little help?
Ademan_:just in general I tried to connect to my Edgy box but I get "the alias "Kronos" could not be opened, because the original item cannot be found"
Has anyone had success running Compiz or Beryl on an nvidia card with TV-out enabled?  Beryl broke my TV-out last time i tried it.  :(
You may get better advice on such issues in #ubuntu-effects
